column1: Little Goat Diner////Service - Our server was friendly & attentive
column2: and was great tending to our needs.  But the restaurant was packed on a Wednesday night
column3: and we had to flag him down a few times.  Service was delayed
column4: but this is really due to how busy they were.  When available
column5: our server was sure to get our orders in and did a great job following up.  Bonus
column6: he made a few great recommendations from the huge menu that turned out to be table pleasers.  1/2 Star.
